program combined

implicit none

integer :: N, i, ans, ng_count
integer, dimension(:), allocatable :: P
integer, dimension(:), allocatable :: map
integer, dimension(:), allocatable :: nglist
integer(8) :: position, nrstSeqStartIndx, startIndex, ans2

! First part

read(*,*) N

allocate(P(1:N))
allocate(map(0:N-1))
allocate(nglist(1:N))  ! 1-based array, up to N elements (max N-1)

! Read P array and adjust
do i =1, N
   read(*,*) P(i)
   P(i) = P(i) -1
end do

! Build map
do i =1, N
   map(P(i)) = i-1  ! since in Java, the index is 0-based (i-1)
end do

! Find nglist
ng_count =0
do i =0, N-2
   if (map(i) > map(i+1)) then
      ng_count = ng_count +1
      nglist(ng_count) = i
   end if
end do

! Compute ans
if (ng_count ==0) then
   ans =0
else
   ans = min( (N - nglist(1) -1), (nglist(ng_count) +1) )
   do i=1, ng_count-1
      integer :: current, next, temp
      current = nglist(i)
      next = nglist(i+1)
      temp = (current +1) + (N - next -1)
      if (temp < ans) ans = temp
   end do
end if

! Second part
position = int(ans,8)

nrstSeqStartIndx = 1_8

do while (getValue(2*nrstSeqStartIndx) < position)
   nrstSeqStartIndx = nrstSeqStartIndx *2
end do

do while (getValue(nrstSeqStartIndx +1) <= position)
   nrstSeqStartIndx = nrstSeqStartIndx +1
end do

startIndex = getValue(nrstSeqStartIndx)

ans2 = (position - startIndex) +1

write(*,*) ans2

contains

integer(8) function getValue(index)
   integer(8), intent(in) :: index
   getValue = 1 + (index-1)*index /2
end function getValue

end program combined
